name: heatu2014warming water-based personal lubricant
about: What it is:A water-based formula that lubricates and creates a warming sensationu2014compatible with natural rubber-latex and polyisoprene condoms..Highlighted Ingredients:- Low-Concentration Capsaicin: Increases heat and enhances stimulation..What Else You Need to Know:This lubricant warms with motion to enhance your natural lubrication and stimulation. It is pH-balanced and free from fragrance and parabens.
ingredients: -Low-Concentration Capsaicin: Increases heat and enhances stimulation. ..Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Chlorphenesin, Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply desired amount to area of body you wish to lubricate and reapply as needed. .-Safe for internal use..-Washes away with warm water..-Compatible with natural rubber-latex and polyisoprene condoms..-Not compatible with polyurethane condoms..-Can be used with devices.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This does not have any noticeable warming qualities and I find it way too thin and watery. I'll stick to Uberlube
